item.title: Adding Full herblore (optional as donator skill)
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:27, topic:417478”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=520034.msg3811730#msg3811730 date=1320983409]

reallly dont like this part

if ((itemUsed == 249) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 249)) {
                        if (donator == 0) {
sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}
if ((itemUsed == 251) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 251)) {
                                if (donator == 0) {
sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}
if ((itemUsed == 253) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 253)) {
                                if (donator == 0) {
sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}
if ((itemUsed == 255) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 255)) {
                                if (donator == 0) {
sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}
if ((itemUsed == 257) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 257)) {
                                if (donator == 0) {
sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}
if ((itemUsed == 2998) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 2998)) {
                                if (donator == 0) {
sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}
if ((itemUsed == 259) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 259)) {
                                if (donator == 0) {
sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}
if ((itemUsed == 261) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 261)) {
                                if (donator == 0) {
sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}
if ((itemUsed == 263) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 263)) {
                                if (donator == 0) {
sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}
if ((itemUsed == 3000) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 3000)) {
                                if (donator == 0) {
sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}
if ((itemUsed == 265) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 265)) {
                                if (donator == 0) {
sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}
if ((itemUsed == 2481) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 2481)) {
                                if (donator == 0) {
sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}
if ((itemUsed == 267) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 267)) {
                                if (donator == 0) {
sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}
if ((itemUsed == 269) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 269)) {
                                if (donator == 0) {
sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}

could do this

if (donator == 1) {
if ((itemUsed == 249) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 249)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 251) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 251)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 253) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 253)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 255) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 255)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 257) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 257)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 2998) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 2998)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 259) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 259)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 261) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 261)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 263) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 263)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 3000) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 3000)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 265) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 265)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 2481) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 2481)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 267) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 267)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 269) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 269)) {
}
} else {
sM("you must be a donator to do this");
}

and work on your conventions.

/f RandQm change it back. I got 100 errors from doing that code. The method itself is correct but how he wrote it totally fucks up.
The first of the 2 Closes the donator statement… The second closes the entire statement. So What I’m trying to say is that your methods are incomplete dragon.
[/quote]
I changed to what I thought it was since I don’t use it myself anymore
I put it in a class now, might add a tut for it soon[/quote]

all dragonimp deserves is credits for fucking up ur tut for that method. But you should clean up ur class.

Read full topic

reallly dont like this part

if ((itemUsed == 249) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 249)) {
                        if (donator == 0) {

sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}
if ((itemUsed == 3000) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 3000)) {
                                if (donator == 0) {
sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}
if ((itemUsed == 265) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 265)) {
                                if (donator == 0) {
sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}
if ((itemUsed == 2481) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 2481)) {
                                if (donator == 0) {
sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}
if ((itemUsed == 267) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 267)) {
                                if (donator == 0) {
sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}
if ((itemUsed == 269) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 269)) {
                                if (donator == 0) {
sM("This is a donators only feature");
}
}

could do this

if (donator == 1) {
if ((itemUsed == 249) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 249)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 251) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 251)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 253) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 253)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 255) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 255)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 257) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 257)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 2998) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 2998)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 259) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 259)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 261) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 261)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 263) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 263)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 3000) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 3000)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 265) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 265)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 2481) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 2481)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 267) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 267)) {
}
if ((itemUsed == 269) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 269)) {
}
} else {
sM("you must be a donator to do this");
}

and work on your conventions.
[/quote]

/f RandQm change it back. I got 100 errors from doing that code. The method itself is correct but how he wrote it totally fucks up.
The first of the 2 Closes the donator statement… The second closes the entire statement. So What I’m trying to say is that your methods are incomplete dragon.[/quote]
I changed to what I thought it was since I don’t use it myself anymore
I put it in a class now, might add a tut for it soon

}

item.title: Adding Full herblore (optional as donator skill)
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:4, topic:417478”]other then that not bad but i would create a handler… something that could do this

public void herbloreStart(int LevelReq, int ItemToDelete, int ItemToDelete2, int ItemToAdd, int XPtoAdd) {
                        if (playerLevel[15] >= LevelReq) {
                                        deleteItem(ItemToDelete, getItemSlot(ItemToDelete), 1);
                                        deleteItem(ItemToDelete2, getItemSlot(ItemToDelete2), 1);
                                        addItem(ItemtoAdd, 1);
                                        addSkillXP(XPtoAdd, 15);
                                        setAnimation(1652);
                                } else {
                                        sM("You need "+LevelReq+" herblore to make this potion.");
                                }
                        }
}

most of your statemetns could be lowered to something like this

if ((itemUsed == 251) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 251)) { herbloreStart(7, 251, 227, 2446, 1500); } [/quote]

I’m not going to add that anymore else its full credits to you hha
they can read it here

item.title: Adding Full herblore (optional as donator skill)
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

other then that not bad but i would create a handler… something that could do this

public void herbloreStart(int LevelReq, int ItemToDelete, int ItemToDelete2, int ItemToAdd, int XPtoAdd) {
                        if (playerLevel[15] >= LevelReq) {
                                        deleteItem(ItemToDelete, getItemSlot(ItemToDelete), 1);
                                        deleteItem(ItemToDelete2, getItemSlot(ItemToDelete2), 1);
                                        addItem(ItemtoAdd, 1);
                                        addSkillXP(XPtoAdd, 15);
                                        setAnimation(1652);
                                } else {
                                        sM("You need "+LevelReq+" herblore to make this potion.");
                                }
                        }
}

most of your statemetns could be lowered to something like this

                        if ((itemUsed == 251) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 251)) {
                                                herbloreStart(7, 251, 227, 2446, 1500);
                        }

Could also add your donator statement like this

if (donator == 1) { if ((itemUsed == 251) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 251)) { herbloreStart(7, 251, 227, 2446, 1500); } if ((itemUsed == 251) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 251)) { herbloreStart(7, 251, 227, 2446, 1500); } } else { sM("You are not a donator and can not use this skill!"); }
